name: STG_CS_INFO
description: This table stores cancer staging information that was determined using Collaborative Staging (CS) or Surveillance, Epidemiology, and End Results (SEER) methods. Note that the only records extracted into this table are those with the Has Collaborative Staging Info (I STG 32) item (KB_SQL column HAS_CS_INFO_C) set to 1.

columns.name: STAGE_ID
columns.description: The cancer stage ID.

columns.name: STAGE_TITLE_NM
columns.description: The title of this cancer stage row, usually indicative of the body site or cancer type being staged.

columns.name: CS_SITE
columns.description: The collaborative staging primary tumor site, using an ICD-O-3 code.

columns.name: CS_HISTOLOGY
columns.description: The collaborative staging histology, using an ICD-O-3 code.

columns.name: CS_GRADE
columns.description: The tumor cell grade for collaborative staging.

columns.name: CS_BEHAVIOR
columns.description: The tumor behavior for collaborative staging.

columns.name: CS_SIZE
columns.description: The tumor size for collaborative staging.

columns.name: CS_EXTENSION
columns.description: The tumor extension for collaborative staging.

columns.name: CS_EXT_EVAL
columns.description: The collaborative staging extension evaluation methods.

columns.name: CS_NODES
columns.description: The regional lymph nodes for collaborative staging.

columns.name: CS_REG_LN_EVAL
columns.description: The regional lymph nodes evaluation methods for collaborative staging.

columns.name: CS_REG_LN_POS
columns.description: The number of regional lymph nodes that were positive, as documented using the corresponding code for collaborative staging.

columns.name: CS_REG_LN_EXAM
columns.description: The number of regional lymph nodes that were examined, as documented using the corresponding code for collaborative staging.

columns.name: CS_METS
columns.description: The distant metastasis component for collaborative staging.

columns.name: CS_METS_EVAL
columns.description: The metastasis evaluation methods for collaborative staging.

columns.name: CS_SSF1
columns.description: The collaborative staging site specific factor 1.

columns.name: CS_SSF2
columns.description: The collaborative staging site specific factor 2.

columns.name: CS_SSF3
columns.description: The collaborative staging site specific factor 3.

columns.name: CS_SSF4
columns.description: The collaborative staging site specific factor 4.

columns.name: CS_SSF5
columns.description: The collaborative staging site specific factor 5.

columns.name: CS_SSF6
columns.description: The collaborative staging site specific factor 6.

columns.name: CS_TDESCR
columns.description: The primary tumor description for collaborative staging.

columns.name: CS_NDESCR
columns.description: The regional lymph nodes description for collaborative staging.

columns.name: CS_MDESCR
columns.description: The distant metastasis description for collaborative staging.

columns.name: CS_SS77_C_NAME
columns.description: The SEER stage according to Summary Stage 1977.

columns.name: CS_SS2000_C_NAME
columns.description: The SEER stage according to Summary Stage 2000.

columns.name: SEER77_T_C_NAME
columns.description: The SEER 77 primary tumor grade.

columns.name: SEER77_N_C_NAME
columns.description: The SEER 77 regional lymph nodes grade.

columns.name: SEER77_M_C_NAME
columns.description: The SEER 77 distant metastasis grade.

columns.name: SEER00_T_C_NAME
columns.description: The SEER 2000 primary tumor grade.

columns.name: SEER00_N_C_NAME
columns.description: The SEER 2000 regional lymph nodes grade.

columns.name: SEER00_M_C_NAME
columns.description: The SEER 2000 distant metastasis grade.
